data.eml:eml: Geophagus crocatus, a new species of geophagine cichlid from the Berbice River, Guyana, South America (Teleostei: Cichlidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hauser, Frances E., López-Fernández, Hernán (2013): Geophagus crocatus, a new species of geophagine cichlid from the Berbice River, Guyana, South America (Teleostei: Cichlidae). Zootaxa 3731 (2): 279-286, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3731.2.8
